name: Entrepreneur Training Program for Artists
description: Recognizing that artists face unique challenges and business models, we have designed an entrepreneur training program specifically for them. In this four-week-long, 3 hours per week program, a group of artists will work in a mutually supportive environment to learn about marketing, finance, business operations, and more for artists. Through lectures, in-class discussions, and assignments, you will acquire knowledge and build a strong foundation for a successful artist business. This program is
